conversations.body_text: Hi Matt H,  Sorry, we have re-shipped your order. Here is your tracking link.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3284517127678

Hi, that link is invalid - the original return says that it has been
replace with SF3286011967549

On Mon, 8 Sept 2025 at 11:29, service@simsonn.com

Hello, this tracking link is invalid?

On Mon, 8 Sept 2025 at 11:29, service@simsonn.com

Hello, this is the link. The parcel has been returned to the courier today for reference and will be re-shipped to you. We apologise for any inconvenience caused. It is expected to be delivered to you on the 15th.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3284517127678
